thread.section_title: Number Sixteen - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely wonderful
thread.title_full: Absolutely wonderful - Review of Number Sixteen, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lambourntraveller
title: Absolutely wonderful
text:
In every aspect this somewhat small privately owned boutique Hotel, converted from a number of terraced houses is wonderful, the staff offer as close to perfect customer care as is in my opinion possible, lovely warm rooms, beautiful quality furnishings and a hidden gen of a rear private garden
All so convenient for the City yet quietly situated but within a few minutes walk of the South Kensington Tube Station
Our weekend stay was over all too soon really but how kind of the staff to present us with a bottle of champagne to help celebrate our 40th anniversary, thank you all of you who helped make the weekend so wonderful and memorable
